body_html:
Thanks @alextp for the review and sorry for the late reply as I missed the GitHub previously notification. Indeed NHWC and NCHW is not appropriate for 1d situations. I have rebased and updated the PR so that NWC and NCW are used instead.

Please take a look and let me know if there are any issues.
body_text:
Thanks @alextp for the review and sorry for the late reply as I missed the GitHub previously notification. Indeed NHWC and NCHW is not appropriate for 1d situations. I have rebased and updated the PR so that NWC and NCW are used instead.
Please take a look and let me know if there are any issues.
body:
Thanks @alextp for the review and sorry for the late reply as I missed the GitHub previously notification. Indeed `NHWC` and `NCHW` is not appropriate for 1d situations. I have rebased and updated the PR so that `NWC` and `NCW` are used instead.

Please take a look and let me know if there are any issues.
